1.name: Spellcasting
1.description: You have learned to cast spells through study and practice.

1.name: Arcane Recovery
1.description: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can recover spell slots with a combined level equal to half your wizard level (rounded up).

2.name: Arcane Tradition
2.description: You choose an arcane tradition: School of Evocation.

2.name: Evocation Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an evocation spell is halved.

2.name: Sculpt Spells
2.description: When you cast an evocation spell that affects others, you can choose a number of creatures equal to 1 + the spell's level. Those creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws and take no damage.
